text: Transsur(Stat, vtable ftable) = case Stat of Decl; Stat | (coder vtabley) = Transpei(Decl. viable) codes = Transsur(Stat: viabley ftable) code;++coder Transpe;(Decl.viable) = case Decl of inc id 11 = newvar() viable = bind(viable, gemame(i0).11) (1, viabler) int id[num] | q = newvar() viable; = bind(vtable, gemame(i0).11) (h := HP,HP := HP + (8 + gervalue(mum))), vrable;)
